title: ShayLegal
author: ShayLegal
content: Being a staunch enthusiast of the gaming crypto ecosystem, I'm often inclined to new gaming projects with good usecases and tokenomics. Personally, I feel they've perceived potential for considerable growth. I've been doing some research and I feel I must have missed out on a few. Please, if you've any on your radar, do well to recommend so I can add to my watchlist, Thanks.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: ShayLegal on December 03, 2023, 04:49:35 PMBeing a staunch enthusiast of the gaming crypto ecosystem, I'm often inclined to new gaming projects with good usecases and tokenomics. Personally, I feel they've perceived potential for considerable growth. I've been doing some research and I feel I must have missed out on a few. Please, if you've any on your radar, do well to recommend so I can add to my watchlist, Thanks.BigtimePetopiaSword and magicAxie infinity v2 classicGuild of guardiansKnights of catenna.There are lots of new games or existing that still alive and able to wrap it up. Maybe you could try to do some of these games. But of course depends on the ecosystem of gaming you like.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Quote from: ShayLegal on December 03, 2023, 04:49:35 PMBeing a staunch enthusiast of the gaming crypto ecosystem, I'm often inclined to new gaming projects with good usecases and tokenomics. Personally, I feel they've perceived potential for considerable growth. I've been doing some research and I feel I must have missed out on a few. Please, if you've any on your radar, do well to recommend so I can add to my watchlist, Thanks. You claimed you have looked into some of these Games, but you failed to list those you have on your radar but looking for new ones, if you want to do your research on Gamefi bucket I will advise you go to Coinmarketcap or Coingecko, click the category button and click the Gamefi buttons so many under the radar projects, look for those that the team is still active and work on releasing updates on their projects or those that received huge VC money then but are currently undervalued below their ICO price.

You claimed you have looked into some of these Games, but you failed to list those you have on your radar but looking for new ones, if you want to do your research on Gamefi bucket I will advise you go to Coinmarketcap or Coingecko, click the category button and click the Gamefi buttons so many under the radar projects, look for those that the team is still active and work on releasing updates on their projects or those that received huge VC money then but are currently undervalued below their ICO price.Rightly said! What I expected of the title "overview".I would have loved to start by mentioning BigTime. Someone else already did that. Their Platform seem to have gotten the much needed exposure. Others on my watchlist includes: Voxies ($VOXEL)Myria ($MYRIA)Nakamoto Games ($NAKA)GAMEE ($GMEE)The project team are still active in their communities.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Is this still in a learning process or you already have something in your mind?Creating your own gaming project is not that easy because you have to consider everything and the crypto games todate are not that in demand due to the problem they faced before which you can use as your advantage to address their issues and provide a better game. Have your best team to make this possible, its not easy but once you do it well I’m sure its all worth it..

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I play dcity on Hive blockchain, it's like a virtual city you manage. You can read about it here [1]. I also used play dcrops named on same chain, however sold my inventory couple months ago. [1] https://hive.blog/@dcitygame

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on December 03, 2023, 05:13:08 PMQuote from: ShayLegal on December 03, 2023, 04:49:35 PMBeing a staunch enthusiast of the gaming crypto ecosystem, I'm often inclined to new gaming projects with good usecases and tokenomics. Personally, I feel they've perceived potential for considerable growth. I've been doing some research and I feel I must have missed out on a few. Please, if you've any on your radar, do well to recommend so I can add to my watchlist, Thanks.BigtimePetopiaSword and magicAxie infinity v2 classicGuild of guardiansKnights of catenna.There are lots of new games or existing that still alive and able to wrap it up. Maybe you could try to do some of these games. But of course depends on the ecosystem of gaming you like. When NFT gaming is still at its hype (or at least there is some hype in it), I've followed Bigtime and Guild of Guardians. Over time, I stopped following them because of how long it took for their game to be released. Can I ask you if the game has been released already, especially with Guild of Guardians? I don't know if it's only, but I love how the gameplay of GOG is. It's kind of Lost Relics in Enjin Blockchain which I used to play a few years ago.Aside from that, can I also ask if are you playing Axie Infinity Classic as well? If yes, what can you say about it? I mean I've seen many Axie Infinity players coming back to play it again. Is there something interesting about it that many players are coming back to play? I still have all of my Axies, and I can just play anytime. I just don't know what attracts old players to play it again.Thanks for answering.

You can DYOR on Naka, Gmee, Bigtime, and Voxel.

It would better if the op list the ones that are is in his radar so whoever listing the new ones will be different from the ones he has in his radar and that how to do things like this. Guess I now know where to go if I need to game, Conmarketcap, is a place of crypto information for me, thanks that you've added another feather for me to visit it. Interests varies and I'm quite envious about how you folks talk about the many crypto games. Guess I'm curious enough now to give it a try, hopefully to be looking forward to new updates, if it catches my interest, then it'd be real fun.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: ShayLegal on December 03, 2023, 04:49:35 PMBeing a staunch enthusiast of the gaming crypto ecosystem, I'm often inclined to new gaming projects with good usecases and tokenomics. Personally, I feel they've perceived potential for considerable growth. I've been doing some research and I feel I must have missed out on a few. Please, if you've any on your radar, do well to recommend so I can add to my watchlist, Thanks.There's no doubt potential for the gaming projects to be known in the scene. We've seen it in the past years and bull run, there are still existing to this date and there will be more. I wouldn't suggest one because it might not be good for you. Just follow the trackers for all of those NFT gaming lists and websites where they list projects that you might think. I've got a few that I think will do good because even if the market was unstable, they're consistent in development.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: I do not deny the potential of this field in the cryptocurrency market, but even when it had previous appearances from simple to complex, the scale and exploitability were always challenges. But in general, if you only care about the investment aspect and finding profits, then that hype is bound to appear, like in 2021, when we have hype for many products and up until now there has been no hype. Many products have the ability to grow. However, according to recent observations, there are also positive things about the product, as the quality improvement is getting better and better. Before that, I also played a lot of metaverse-related games on the WAX ​​system and felt that they also had great potential because some other famous games still do not have a combination with blockchain.

comments.author: Wahyuihib
comments.body: I'm not really familiar with many game-based cryptocurrencies.  maybe the Axie Infinity V2 Classic is all I remember.  because this game has a big influence on crypto users, especially those who love games.  just by playing games, everyone has the right to earn a large income..

But I hop it have a good impact so I can liquidate some of my remaining or forgotten axies.

comments.author: GreenStox
comments.body: I see so many new game projects recently you can see them on Twitter or Telegram groups, for now you can visit Xterio Game, a special crypto game platform backed by Binance Labs, please visit the site to see if you are interested.
